name: Erix 3310
description:
Click on the game to enable keyboard focus.
Move with arrow keys or numpad (4,8,6&2).

This is a clone of an old game called Erix that I played as a kid on my Sony Ericsson T86i.  This game was made for the Nokia 3310 JAM 5 and thus is made for the resolution and color palette of that phone.
